io.amcp.examples.weather

Class WeatherConsumerAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.amcp.core.AbstractAgent
      • io.amcp.examples.weather.WeatherConsumerAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent, Serializable

    public class WeatherConsumerAgent
extends AbstractAgent
    Configurable weather consumer agent that monitors weather data and generates alerts based on configurable thresholds. Supports data aggregation and trend analysis.
    See Also:
